Test.Name: Correct response: one recording job
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response with one recording job

Test.Name: Correct response: no recordings
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response with no recordings

Test.Name: Correct response: several recording jobs
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response with several recording jobs

Test.Name: Correct response: no recording jobs
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response with no recording jobs

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different RecordingToken
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response with different RecordingToken in GetRecordingJobs and GetRecordingJobConfiguration response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different Mode
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response with different Mode in GetRecordingJobs and GetRecordingJobConfiguration response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different Priority
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response with different Priority in GetRecordingJobs and GetRecordingJobConfiguration response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different SourceToken
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response with different SourceToken in GetRecordingJobs and GetRecordingJobConfiguration response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different SourceToken.Type
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response with different SourceToken.Type in GetRecordingJobs and GetRecordingJobConfiguration response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different SourceTag
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response with different SourceTag in GetRecordingJobs and GetRecordingJobConfiguration response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different Destination
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response with different Destination in GetRecordingJobs and GetRecordingJobConfiguration response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: Source is present only in GetRecordingJobs
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: optional parameter Source is present only in GetRecordingJobs response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: SourceToken is present only in one response
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: optional parameter SourceToken is present only in GetRecordingJobs response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: SourceToken.Type is present only in one response
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: optional attribute SourceToken.Type is present only in GetRecordingJobs response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: Tracks is present only in one response
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: optional parameter Tracks is present only in GetRecordingJobs response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: not existing RecordingToken
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response with JobItem.JobConfiguration.RecordingToken that does not exist in GetRecordingsResponse message

Test.Name: No response
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends no response on GetRecordingJobConfiguration

Test.Name: Fault
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends fault on GetRecordingJobConfiguration

Test.Name: Correct response: no optional Source parameter
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response with one recording job
